about_the_game:
Welcome to a world where the line between man and machine blurs and every step is monitored by the all-seeing eye of Central Security! The Cyber City Character Creator Kit offers a glimpse into a future where conformity is enforced and individuality is expressed through cybernetic augmentation. With these assets, you can create characters who defy the system, rebels with a cause, or obedient citizens trapped in a web of surveillance and control. From cybernetic enhancements to futuristic fashion, this pack provides the tools to craft a society where the price of freedom is something beyond the means of most.

This asset pack contains over 190 character creator pieces that will let you create:

* Cyberpunk misfits
* Dystopian peacekeepers
* Shopkeepers, street people
* Street samurai
* Deckers and hackers
* And much more, mix and match all pieces to create countless characters!

All character pieces come in 8 directional facings with a multitude of supported animations. There are over 70 animations for the character sprites and a total of nearly 2,500 frames of animation per piece.

Also included are 16 large character portraits that can be used as paperdolls, busts, face-sets, and more.

You’ll need to be familiar with art programs to make the most of this pack, but if you do then the possibilities are unlimited! With 5 body bases for both male and female characters, you can create fully human, cybernetically-enhanced human, and completely robotic heroes to fit your story and world.

These character pieces are fully compatible with all other PVGames character pieces with the RPGTools asset label so you are free to mix and match and grow your extensive character piece library!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
